content.rendered:
The Story Behind Our Success

Who Are We

Techlife Finance is a financial service firm with a focus on digital assets. Techlife Finance team combines deep technical expertise in the emerging asset class with decades of experience launching investment vehicles for a wide variety of market partcipants. The firm is led by experienced financial veterans with decades of experience across firms including Mabcredit, Lowry Consulting GMBH, Guggenheim Partners and Chicago Board of Trade Techlife Finance has deep expartise in traditional asset management with extensive background in Fund management, Portfolio management, Investment Banking and scaling financial products with major financial firms. we aim to be the expert across the universe of investment and digital assets.

Techlife Finance has deep expartise in traditional asset management with extensive background in Fund management, Portfolio management, Investment Banking and scaling financial products with major financial firms. we aim to be the expert across the universe of investment and digital assets.

Always Ready To Reach Out

Connected… Committed.

What unites a global investment and research company? Communicating with our customers, our culture, each other and the communities we serve. This unity fosters cooperation and empowers us to pursue a common goal — to bring about better results.

A Brighter Future For All

Fully Invested in Your Future.

We are committed to helping you achieve the best results … the way you describe them. We get there by empowering different ideas and crossing boundaries. We work together and connect — and we never stop working for you.

100% Safety On All Your Assets

Asset Management

We are committed to the search for alpha. A unique combination of expertise across all divisions, consistent revenue, alternatives to multiple assets and a network of global networks helps us to deliver different information and different solutions to enhance investor success.

Want to know more about us?

DOWNLOAD BROCHURE

OUR GOALS

Techlife Finance was built with the mission of making investing a more simple endeavour for everyone, not only expert investors. Democratization is a noun that represents this new century in a very strong sense. With technology becoming more accessible to more people, the solutions they bring are expanding into new markets as well. We utilize this new ubiquity of technology to bring cutting edge investing solutions and planning right to your screens.

DEMOCRATIZATION

Make successful investing accessible to users around the globe, regardless of their demographic make up and financial situation. Avoid discriminating by using bitcoin for payment processing rather than any country specific fiat currencies.

CONVENIENCE

Evolve our offer and the Techlife Finance platform to be as easy to use as possible. Provide tutorials and unparalleled customer support in order to maintain as frictionless of an experience as possible for our customers and make earning as simple as flipping a switch.

GROWTH

Build Techlife Finance into a colossal and far reaching platform by bringing stellar results and consistent profits to our users. To achieve this we use professional investing strategies and detailed analysis combined with a secure system with a reserve fund.

THE OFFER

A user-friendly platform, high security, a good percentage of daily profits, are guaranteed with Techlife Finance investment bundles.
Ranging from profits of 6%-20%, with a cycle of 2-7 days, depending on the selected plan.

There is a minimum of $100 investment and a maximum of $1000000 investment. Deposits can be repeated at convenience, and withdrawals processed at convenience.

How it works is that all deposited funds are pooled within one investment fund, with each investor receiving a share of the fund that has value directly proportional to the amount invested. We conduct all investment activities, regardless, you will stay in charge of your funds at all times.

The profits made that are collected by Us after distributing the accruals are directed towards financing day-to-day operations and building a reserve fund to serve as a guarantee for a future of stable accruals for our customers.

THE BENEFITS OF Techlife Finance

To be the top investment platform in this modern, saturated market, it was important to create a solution that is multifaceted and made to anticipate and accommodate the many needs of its users.

The Techlife Finance platform, beyond being an investment plan developed by experts, is also a professionally engineered and upheld project from the standpoint of technical execution. Read below some of the many benefits of using Techlife Finance

PRIORITY SERVICE

24/7 customer support, tutorials, and extensive and ever-expanding FAQ section: every Techlife Finance client receives VIP treatment.

PRIVATE AND SECURE

A modern security system of the highest order combined with Bitcoin as payment processor ensure unparalleled security.

INSTANT WITHDRAWALS

Both your principal and profit can be instantly withdrawn, 24 hours, seven days a week in order to keep you in control of your finances.

UNLIMITED INVESTMENTS

Techlife Finance investment cycles have no limits and can be renewed as many times as you like, you can profit from your investment for a lifetime.

DIVERSE PORTFOLIO

Investments are diversified across multiple disconnected fields in order to minimize risk and allow venturing in fields that yield a higher return.

DAILY ACCRUALS

Every investor will receive a guaranteed daily profit of 2.0% on work days and 1.0% on weekends. This profit will be automatically added to their Techlife Finance wallet balance.

FUTURE GROWTH

Techlife Finance is a company with a clear roadmap and expansion plans for the future that will only enhance our customers’ experience.

HIGH RETURN

The daily return percentage for our offered bundle will generate approximately 50% of profit from your initial investment every month.

ANALYSIS FIRST

We pride ourselves on a strong analytical department that conducts in-depth research on each investment field, continuously optimizing the investment process

CAREER POTENTIAL

Our affiliate program provides the possibility to develop your activities into a career for the most active members of our community.

DEDICATED SERVER

A dedicated server means quicker load times, higher safety, and a more stable website experience for all users of the Techlife Finance platform.

COMPOUNDING OPTION

Compounding can be applied to all investment cycles, generating an additional layer of income over time.

WHERE WE INVEST

Developing a diverse investment portfolio that is based on expert analysis guarantees a higher rate of success and therefore allows us to cement the daily profit needed to deliver the promised accrual rates to our customers. In this section we have outlined and described the investment sectors in which Techlife Finance ventures on a day to day basis.

1. FOREX MARKETS

Market daily volume                  Portfolio%

$5.1 trillion                                                45% – 55%

FX, Forex, foreign exchange market, currency market – all these terms are synonyms that refer to the Forex market.

Trading Forex involves the buying of one currency and simultaneous selling of another. In Forex, traders attempt to profit by buying and selling currencies and actively speculating on the direction currencies are likely to take in the future.

Forex trading is considered one of the largest and most liquid markets in the world. According to a recent triennial report from the Bank for International Settlements (a global bank for national central banks), the dollar amount of daily transactions in the Forex market is around USD 5 trillion, and $1.5 trillion of this amount comes from spot trading. The large dimensions of the market make finding buyers and sellers fast and easy, allowing for a dynamic investing process. This volatility can be difficult because of the limited decision time, which is why dedicated investor teams tend to be more successful than “side traders”.

There are three ways that corporations, individuals, and institutions trade Forex: the spot market, the Forex market, and the futures market. At our company, we focus on the spot market because the forwards and futures markets are used more actively by companies that need to hedge their foreign exchange risks out to a specific date in the future.

The spot market is where currencies are bought and sold at their current price. This price, among other things, can be influenced by the economic performance of representing countries, local and international political situations, as well as the seeming future performance of currencies against one another. These factors, combined with many others, create daily speculations and communal perspectives, which in turn create volatility for the Forex market. Expert investors like the Techlife Finance team can analyze and utilize this volatility and profit from both interest rate differentials and changes in the exchange rate.

2. DIGITAL EXCHANGE

Market daily volume                  Portfolio%

$237 billion                                                22% – 32%

Digital exchange, also referred to as the digital currency exchange or the cryptocurrency exchange, is a digital marketplace that allows customers, be it businesses or individuals, to trade cryptocurrencies. They can be exchanged for conventional fiat currencies or other digital currencies.

Cryptocurrencies have seen a great surge in both values an sortiment of available positions to invest. This market has become especially popular among investors that prefer trading short-term – on price movements.

Currently there are more than 1 500 different cryptocurrencies that can all be traded. Since it is imperative that investors are experts in the price movements and trends of the currency they are planning to trade with, the ability to compartmentalize, research independently, and then combine the knowledge as a team is key to our ability to execute high return yielding trades.

The crypto market consists of a lot of small players and potential unicorns in the making. Because of this, public outlook on individual coins as well as the market itself is vital. Even more so than with Forex markets, this is a market of information and perception. This means, that prices are influenced by media coverage, government regulations and concerns over them, even statements from influencers in the crypto and business fields.

Strong knowledge of the field and continuous research are the cornerstones of our investing approach, and this approach allows us to successfully trade cryptocurrencies in short term, making a sizeable profit on the volatility of the market.

3. BITCOIN MINING

Market daily volume                  Portfolio%

$15,8 million                                                8% – 14%

Fiat money is centralized and its’ printing and distribution is controlled by the government and its’ central bank. Cryptocurrencies and – in our case more specifically – bitcoin is a decentralized currency. Which means it has no main governing entity that is responsible for the distribution and creation of bitcoin.

That is where bitcoin mining comes into play. Bitcoin mining is the process of using special software to solve math equations that are ever growing in complexity. What these miners effectively do is help secure the network by approving recent transactions with their computational power. In return they receive a certain number of bitcoins in exchange. This is how new bitcoins are made.

The process does seem relatively simple, however there is an answer to the obvious question of why isn’t everyone mining bitcoin if it is simply a question of running a software.

What these miners ar actually doing is trying to be the first miner to come up with a 64-digit hexadecimal number (also known as “hash”) that is less than or equal to the target hash. For lack of a better word this is guesswork in the digital form. Since the total number of possible guesses is on the order of trillions, bitcoin mining becomes an arduous and computing power consuming activity.

That is why investing funds like Crystalfunds Limited are suited for bitcoin mining. By merging our investors’ funds, Techlife Finance is able to buy into large bitcoin mining pools with high hash rates. That way we can grant our customers access to this low-risk investment method and strengthen our investment portfolio as a whole, as well as help the Bitcoin industry.

4. VENTURE CAPITAL

Market daily volume                  Portfolio%

$383 million                                                12% – 20%

Venture capital is a form of investing into startup companies and small businesses that are believed to have potential for exponential growth in the long term. Relatively young businesses that have recently displayed impressive growth and appear poised to continue this growth are also often invested into. Even though sometimes the value added can be expertise or resources, in the case of Techlife Finance, the investment we place into the companies is monetary.

For new companies (two years old and less), especially in the tech field, this type of seeding is becoming more and more popular.

To increase the certainty with which we invest in startups, we perform due diligence for each proposal, which includes a detailed and thorough investigation into the company’s business model, operating history, product management systems, as well as a multitude of other indicators. High quality, accurate research is once again imperative to success in this field.

The Techlife Finance team invests in startups that use blockchain technology, both because of our expertise in the field and the shorter investment ROI cycles. This is by far the most long term investment strategy that is incorporated into our plan, however it is one of the more potentially lucrative ones.

Differentiated Insights

Different ideas promote different details, which we translate into a wide range of new solutions across all allocations, fixed income, alternatives and multiple asset plans.

Uncommonly Collaborative

Who we are and what we stand for is the same for all clients, but the way we work with them is by no means the same. Our customers are customers of the whole company. Everyone in our team is involved in organizing our many resources to meet your specific needs.

Responsibility

At Techlife Finance, we make and invest in commitment, striving to create better results for the clients we serve, the communities we serve and the world in which we live.

Culture

The tradition is always present in the Techlife Finance. We work every day to create a diverse, inclusive and connected culture that empowers everyone to become a better person.
